GAMEPLAY_ccCaptainCardDescription.English: A replica keycard for a fishing boat.
GAMEPLAY_ccCaptainCardDescription.Simplified Chinese: KP31神秘科技卡牌系列 之 渔船卡牌，似乎与煤炭有些联系。使用后获得12个煤炭
